item.title: Fernando Olvera
item.description: José Fernando Emilio 'Fher' Olvera Sierra is the secondary guitarist, composer, and lead singer for the Mexican rock band Maná, the most successful Latin American band of all time with over 40 million albums sold worldwide.

item.title: Sergio Vallín
item.description: Sergio Vallín Loera is a Mexican guitarist of the Mexican band Maná. Vallín was born in Mexico City, where he lived for the first ten years of his life until he moved with his family to Aguascalientes, capital of the state of the same name. Thus he has nicknamed himself 'Hidrocálido', after one of the demonyms for his adopted city.
